description.en: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.ar: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.br: Uma Caixa Gacha contendo Consumíveis Premium! O último jogador a abri-la recebe uma Caixa do Conjunto de Banho. Todos os itens são Ligados à Alma.
description.cns: 包含商城消耗品的抽奖礼盒！最后一位开启的玩家可以得到浴袍套装。所有物品都是角色绑定的。
description.de: Eine Gacha-Box, die Premium-Verbrauchsgegenstände enthält! Der letzte Spieler, der sie öffnet, erhält eine Shower Costume Box. Alle Gegenstände sind seelengebunden.
description.fi: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.fil: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.fr: Une boîte contenant des Consommables Premium! Le dernier joueur à l'ouvrir reçoit un Ensemble de Grande classe pour sortir du bain. Tous les items sont liés.
description.id: Kotak Gacha berisi Premium Consumables! Pemain terakhir yang membukanya menerima Shower Costume Box. Semua item adalah Soul-Linked.
description.it: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.jp: プレミアム消耗品が入ったガチャボックス！最後に開封したプレイヤーに「シャワーファッションボックス」をプレゼント。全てのアイテムはプレイヤーに帰属されています。
description.kr: 고급 소모품이 들어있는 가챠 박스! 마지막으로 개봉한 플레이어는 샤워 코스튬 박스를 얻게 됩니다. 모든 아이템은 귀속됩니다.
description.nl: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.pl: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.ru: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.sp: ¡Una Caja Gacha que contiene Consumibles Premium! El último jugador en abrirlo recibe una Caja de Vestimenta de Ducha. Todos los objetos están Vinculados al Alma.
description.sw: A Gacha Box containing Premium Consumables! The last player to open it receives a Shower Costume Box. All items are Soul-Linked.
description.th: กล่อง Gacha ที่บรรจุวัสดุสิ้นเปลืองพรีเมียม! ผู้เล่นคนสุดท้ายที่เปิดออกจะได้รับกล่องชุดอาบน้ำ ไอเทมทั้งหมดผูกมัด
description.tw: 包含高級消耗品的轉蛋箱！最後一個打開它的玩家會收到一個淋浴服裝箱。所有道具都是歸屬的。
description.vi: Hộp Gacha chứa Vật phẩm Cao cấp! Người chơi cuối cùng mở nó sẽ nhận được Hộp trang phục tắm. Tất cả các vật phẩm đều là Soul-Linked.
